name: ORD_COC_PROV
description: The ORD_COC_PROV table contains information about the coordinated care providers associated with an order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
